text: Mike Sullivan affirms Tristan Jarry will start tonight.
Tristan Jarry starts for #penguins tonight vs #mnwild

Tristan Jarry will get the start in goal tonight in Minnesota. Coach Sullivan: "Tristan is a real good goalie and we have ultimate faith in him. Hes a solid goalie - he works hard at it." https://t.co/t6rEBfpcYE
